data.title: Magic Castle
data.statement:
A Magic Castle has n locked rooms labeled from 0 to n - 1 and you have a key only to room 0. 

You want to get treasures from all the rooms, but you need to have a key to enter a locked room.

In every room random keys are waiting for you with numbers pointing to a corresponding door. 
And you can take all of them with you to use later.

Given a count of rooms in a castle and key sets in each of them you need to check if you can grab all the treasures.
data.stubGenerator:
read n:int
loop n read roomKeySet:string(30)
write numberOfUnreachableRooms
data.inputDescription:
<<line 1>>: [[n]] - number of rooms in a castle.
<<The next n lines>>: The set of [[m]] keys in a room separated by spaces.
data.outputDescription: Please output number of unreachable rooms. If all rooms are reachable - it should be 0.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

A Magic Castle has n locked rooms labeled from 0 to n - 1 and you have a key only to room 0.

You want to get treasures from all the rooms, but you need to have a key to enter a locked room.

In every room random keys are waiting for you with numbers pointing to a corresponding door.
And you can take all of them with you to use later.

Given a count of rooms in a castle and key sets in each of them you need to check if you can grab all the treasures.
Input
line 1: n - number of rooms in a castle.
The next n lines: The set of m keys in a room separated by spaces.
Output
Please output number of unreachable rooms. If all rooms are reachable - it should be 0.
Constraints
2 <= n <= 99
1 <= m <= 10
Example
Input
4
1 2
2 1
3 0
0
Output
0
